dc_title_s: Provincia: La provence; apud Iudocum et Henricum Janssonium.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. From the Composite Atlas of France, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. Includes the Provence coat of arms and illustrations of ships on the Mediterranean. Scale cartouche also includes the date 1621. 1 map; 37 x 48 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner. Composite Atlas of France.,Hondius, Hendrik, 1597-1651, cartographer.,Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629, cartographer.
